Normal.Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!
Normal.Effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and 1,000 HP to the selected character.

Delicious.Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.
Delicious.Effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and 1,200 HP to the selected character.

Suspicious.Description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.
Suspicious.Effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and 800 HP to the selected character.

Fruity Skewers.Description: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste.Wait...Is this really the smell of fruit?
Fruity Skewers.Effect: Restores 16% of Max HP and an additional 1,350 HP.
